title: Elon Musk Says Twitter Is Removing Inactive Accounts, Freeing up Desired Usernames
description: The Twitter logo is seen on a phone in this photo illustration in Washington, on July 10, 2019. (Alastair Pike/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Tech Companies Announce Mass Layoffs Amid Economic Woes
description: Members of the Alphabet Workers Union hold a rally outside the Google office in response to recent layoffs, in New York on Feb. 2, 2023. (Ed Jones/AFP via Getty Images)
